text_cell.description: scheme for text cel and childrenm (level only optionnal argument for HEader cell)

___source.description: for code cell, the source code

items.description: each item represent one line of the source code written, terminated by

any_cell.description: Meta cell type that match any cell type

description: custom json structure with references to generate notebook schema

___cells.description: array of cells of the current worksheet

___nbformat.description: Notebook format, major number. Incremented between backward incompatible change is introduced.

___worksheets.description: Array of worksheet, not used by the current implementation of ipython yet

___nbformat_minor.description: Notebook format, minor number. Incremented for slight variation of notebook format.

___metadata.description: the metadata atribute can contain any additionnal information

___format.description: the format of the notebook - based on internal IPython save format

___description.description: the short description of the notebook

___data_dependencies.description: Dictionary of additional data dependencies - keyed on kbase object reference type, values are array of string ids

___ws_name.description: the workspace where this narrative came from - set on load and save

___outputs.description: output for code cell, to be definied
